sentences.en: A hectare farmland in Rwanda used to earn about 420 dollars a year.
sentences.cn: 在卢旺达,从前一公顷农田年收益可达420美元.

sentences.en: A hectare is equal to 15 mu.
sentences.cn: 1公顷合15市亩.

sentences.en: A hectare of farmland in Rwanda used to earn about fourtwenty dollars $ 420 a year.
sentences.cn: 在卢旺达一英亩的农田每年能够获得420美元的受益.

sentences.en: Area area 131 square kilometer, its intertill ground accumulates 8044 hectare.
sentences.cn: 区域面积131平方公里, 其中耕地面积8044公顷.

sentences.en: At present area of haven land region 2700 hectare, space area 7700 hectare, mutual berth 250.
sentences.cn: 目前港口陆域面积2700公顷, 海域面积7700公顷, 共有泊位250个.

sentences.en: But during that time in Mardagascar, it produced average product here ( tons per hectare ) .
sentences.cn: 但是在马达加斯加时, 它平均 亩产 八吨.

sentences.en: In this system, farmers clear a new plot of about a hectare each year.
sentences.cn: 在这种系统中, 农夫们每年清理出约一公顷的小地方.

sentences.en: Integrated cultivation should be practised to increase the yield and profit per hectare.
sentences.cn: 应用综合性栽培措施,增加产量,提高单位面积的纯收益.

sentences.en: Mist rose from a nearby stand of thriving eucalyptus trees she planted after receiving title to more than a hectare of farmland.
sentences.cn: 雾气从附近生长繁茂的桉树林中升起，这些树是她在获得对一公顷多农田的所有权后栽种的。

sentences.en: One hectare of pine forest can retain 36.4 tons of dust annually.
sentences.cn: 一公顷松林一年可吸滞灰尘约36.4吨.

sentences.en: Researchers at the algae greenhouse plan to scale up the trial to a 100 hectare (247 acre) site over the next three years.
sentences.cn: 藻类温室的研究人员计划在未来三年内将试验范围扩大到一片100公顷（合247英亩）的场地上。

sentences.en: Such fees can be flat - so many dollars a hectare - or they can broadly differentiated by income levels.
sentences.cn: 这类费用可以统一标准 -- 每公顷若干美元 -- 或者可以按收入水平加以划分.

sentences.en: The lands were to be sold at $ 2.50 per hectare.
sentences.cn: 土地的售价为每公顷2. 50美元.

sentences.en: The rate of production per hectare is very high in England.
sentences.cn: 在英国每公顷土地的产量很高.

sentences.en: There are 100 acres in a hectare.
sentences.cn: 1公顷等于100英亩.

sentences.en: There are 2.47 acres in a hectare.
sentences.cn: 1公顷等于2.47英亩.

sentences.en: This could be estimated at 1000 litres of hydrogen for 330 grams of chlorophyll per day whereas for example colza produces roughly only 1000 litres of oil per hectare . . .
sentences.cn: 这种农场每天估计能够产生1000升氢气，而且只消耗330克叶绿素； 而比如种植菜籽，每公顷土地才能产生大约1000升油。

sentences.en: This could be estimated at 1000 litres of hydrogen for 330 grams of chlorophyll per day whereas for example colza produces roughly only 1000 litres of oil per hectare . . .
sentences.cn: 这种农场每天估计能够产生1000升氢气，而且只消耗330克叶绿素； 而比如种植菜籽，每公顷土地才能产生大约1000升油。

sentences.en: This one - hectare area is bordered by what is called the Shoulder Hedge.
sentences.cn: 这个拥有占地一公顷的区域与所谓的“肩之树篱”接壤.

sentences.en: We can get about four tons per hectare of oil from those palm trees, ten times as much as other major oil crops like olive seed, soy bean.
sentences.cn: 从每公顷土地种植的棕榈树中，我们可以获得约四吨棕榈油，棕榈树出油率极高，是橄榄仁、大豆等其他主要油料作物的十倍之多。

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring area, equal to 10,000 square metres
